events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience in software development and programming languages.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will reach out soon to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
Your profile has passed the initial screening phase. We were impressed by your software engineering skills and relevant project experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to the interview scheduling request. We look forward to our conversation and further assessment.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding exercises and system design discussions.
The technical interview completion was successful. Our engineering panel appreciated your problem-solving approach and clear communication.
We have scheduled the HR interview for May 9th at 3:00 PM UTC. This session will cover cultural fit and employment details.
Your HR interview went very well. The team values your alignment with our company culture and your career aspirations.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary details and benefits. Please review it at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
We have received your acceptance of the offer. Welcome aboard! The onboarding process will begin shortly.
Your onboarding activities have started. Please complete the paperwork and attend the orientation sessions as scheduled.
The hiring process is now successfully closed. We are thrilled to have you on our engineering team and look forward to great achievements together.
